summary: "Batman" is an American TV show about the DC Comics superhero. It stars Adam West as Batman and Burt Ward as Robin, who fight crime in Gotham City. Known for its funny and colorful style, it aired from 1966 to 1968 with 120 episodes. The show was popular and held the record for the longest-running live-action superhero series until 2007. It was ranked as one of the greatest American TV series in 2016.
title: Batman (TV series)
